question: Which river divides the city of Toru≈Ñ, Poland into two parts?
asked_question_translated: Katera reka deli mesto Torunj na Poljskem na dva dela?
answer: Mesto Torunj na Poljskem deli reka Visla na dva dela.
answer_translated_eng: Torunj, Poland, is divided into two parts by the Vistula River.
